article.title: General Dynamics Awarded $900 Million for Receive Suites and Retrofit Kits
article.author: George Seffers

tags.tag: Global Broadcast Service Joint Program Office

article.text: General Dynamics C4 Systems, Taunton, Massachusetts, is being awarded a $900 million maximum indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract to allow the Global Broadcast Service Joint Program Office to acquire approximately 1,500 new receive suites, and approximately 1,100 retrofit kits, for fielded systems. Electronic Systems Center, Hanscom Air Force Base, Massachusetts, is the contracting activity.
